thread.title: NEW MILWAUKEE START-UP TAKES THE PAPER OUT OF PAPERWORK FOR TEAM SPORTS AND CLUBS
thread.title_full: NEW MILWAUKEE START-UP TAKES THE PAPER OUT OF PAPERWORK FOR TEAM SPORTS AND CLUBS

author: admin
title: NEW MILWAUKEE START-UP TAKES THE PAPER OUT OF PAPERWORK FOR TEAM SPORTS AND CLUBS
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 12:55 PM Companies mentioned in this article: SportsForms 
MILWAUKEE, Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- SportsForms LLC launches to eliminate paper documents and forms for teams, clubs, organizations, tournaments and schools. No more paper forms to distribute, print out, manually sign, scan, fax or mail - all document collection is done securely online with nothing but a computer with a web browser, or a smartphone or tablet. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150908/264194 
"As a team manager for all my kids' teams, it blew me away how much needless paper documentation was still being pushed around as part of the youth sports and club system." - Michael Brown, Owner/Founder of SportsForms. 
Parents love SportsForms because it allows them to quickly and easily complete all the documentation needed for their child's activities from devices they use all the time. Clubs and leagues love it because the efficiency and reliability of electronic collection far surpasses what's possible with classic paper forms. 
"Such a great idea. I just printed and filled out three times as many forms for one sports team than I did to register my son for high school!" -- Andrea K 
Send, Sign and Save your Team Paperwork Electronically! 
Media Contact: Michael Brown, SportsForms, 414-533-5497, info@SportsForms.club 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE SportsForms
